row.process: SQL_ON_ROWCOUNT_ZERO RETCODE=10; -- ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ -- BEREITGESTELLT VON TH.BRODRECHT ITD-SYM -- TEL. : 2920 -- SPUFI : TSTSTAND -- ZWECK : PRUEFUNG DER TABELLEN -- TBBVTR_T_STAND, -- TBBVTR_T_SOND_AUFT, -- TBBVTR_T_SO_BU_EXT, -- TBBVTR_T_SOND_BUCH, -- TBBPROD_PROD_T_BW AUF KONSISTENZ. -- DER FOKUS LIEGT HIER AUF DER KOMBINA- -- TION VON PROD_SKZ UND PROD_T_SKZ. -- VORBEREITUNG FUER DEN BBS MONATSSCHLUSS -- ERWARTETES ERGEBNIS: KEINE TREFFER -- +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ -- TBBVTR_T_STAND -- +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ SELECT 'TBBVTR_T_STAND' AS QUELLE, T1.MANDANT, T1.VTR_NR, T1.VTR_T_ID, T1.PROD_SKZ, T1.PROD_T_SKZ FROM TBBVTR_T_STAND T1 WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT '1' FROM TBBPROD_PROD_T_BW T2 WHERE T1.PROD_SKZ = T2.PROD_SKZ AND T1.PROD_T_SKZ = T2.PROD_T_SKZ ) UNION -- +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ -- TBBVTR_T_SOND_AUFT -- +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ SELECT 'TBBVTR_T_SOND_AUFT' AS QUELLE, T1.MANDANT, T1.VTR_NR, T1.VTR_T_ID, T1.PROD_SKZ, T1.PROD_T_SKZ FROM TBBVTR_T_SOND_AUFT T1 WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT '1' FROM TBBPROD_PROD_T_BW T2 WHERE T1.PROD_SKZ = T2.PROD_SKZ AND T1.PROD_T_SKZ = T2.PROD_T_SKZ ) UNION -- +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ -- TBBVTR_T_SOND_BUCH -- +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ SELECT 'TBBVTR_T_SOND_BUCH' AS QUELLE, T1.MANDANT, T1.VTR_NR, T1.VTR_T_ID, T1.PROD_SKZ, T1.PROD_T_SKZ FROM TBBVTR_T_SOND_BUCH T1 WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT '1' FROM TBBPROD_PROD_T_BW T2 WHERE T1.PROD_SKZ = T2.PROD_SKZ AND T1.PROD_T_SKZ = T2.PROD_T_SKZ ) UNION -- +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ -- TBBVTR_T_SO_BU_EXT -- +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ SELECT 'TBBVTR_T_SO_BU_EXT' AS QUELLE, T1.MANDANT, T1.VTR_NR, T1.VTR_T_ID, T1.PROD_SKZ, T1.PROD_T_SKZ FROM TBBVTR_T_SO_BU_EXT T1 WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT '1' FROM TBBPROD_PROD_T_BW T2 WHERE T1.PROD_SKZ = T2.PROD_SKZ AND T1.PROD_T_SKZ = T2.PROD_T_SKZ ) ;

row.post_process: :SET &RET# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,RETCODE) :IF &RET# NE 10 : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE=1 :ELSE : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE=0 :ENDIF
